code:
import{database,ref,set,onValue,push,remove}from'../firebase';// Save data to Firebase for a specific user
export const saveExpenses=(userId,expenses)=>{const expensesRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/expenses"));return set(expensesRef,expenses);};export const saveIncomes=(userId,incomes)=>{const incomesRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/incomes"));return set(incomesRef,incomes);};export const saveCategories=(userId,categories)=>{const categoriesRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/categories"));return set(categoriesRef,categories);};// Listen for data changes for a specific user
export const listenForExpenses=(userId,callback)=>{const expensesRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/expenses"));return onValue(expensesRef,snapshot=>{const data=snapshot.val();callback(data||{});});};export const listenForIncomes=(userId,callback)=>{const incomesRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/incomes"));return onValue(incomesRef,snapshot=>{const data=snapshot.val();callback(data||{});});};export const listenForCategories=(userId,callback)=>{const categoriesRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/categories"));return onValue(categoriesRef,snapshot=>{const data=snapshot.val();const defaultCategories={expense:['Food','Transport','Entertainment','Utilities','Other'],income:['Salary','Freelance','Investment','Other']};callback(data||defaultCategories);});};// Add new expense for a specific user
export const addExpense=(userId,expense)=>{const expensesRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/expenses"));return push(expensesRef,expense);};// Add new income for a specific user
export const addIncome=(userId,income)=>{const incomesRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/incomes"));return push(incomesRef,income);};// Delete expense for a specific user
export const deleteExpense=(userId,expenseId)=>{const expenseRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/expenses/").concat(expenseId));return remove(expenseRef);};// Delete income for a specific user
export const deleteIncome=(userId,incomeId)=>{const incomeRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/incomes/").concat(incomeId));return remove(incomeRef);};// Update categories for a specific user
export const updateCategories=(userId,categories)=>{const categoriesRef=ref(database,"users/".concat(userId,"/categories"));return set(categoriesRef,categories);};
